recipe_name: Crisp prosciutto, tomato and rocket salad
author: Brian Turner
method: Preheat the grill until hot. Place one slice of prosciutto onto a baking sheet and place under the grill for 2-3 minutes, or until crisp. Remove from the grill and set aside. Finely chop the remaining slice of prosciutto and set aside. Arrange the tomato slices on a serving plate and top with the rocket. Place the remaining ingredients and the chopped prosciutto into a small bowl and whisk until combined. To serve, pour the dressing over the salad on the serving plate and top with the crisp prosciutto.
ingredients: 2 slices prosciutto,  1 tomato, sliced,  large handful fresh rocket,  2 tbsp olive oil,  1 tsp wholegrain mustard,  1 tsp clear honey,  salt and freshly ground black pepper ,  2 tsp white wine vinegar
